data.title: Distance from East London to Gaborone
data.meta_description: Distance between East London and Gaborone is 950 kilometers (590 miles) in South Africa, Botswana. Also calculate the driving distance and how far is it the travel time.
data.text:
How far is it between East London and Gaborone

East London is located in South Africa with (-33.0153,27.9116) coordinates and Gaborone is located in Botswana with (-24.6545,25.9086) coordinates. The calculated flying distance from East London to Gaborone is equal to 590 miles which is equal to 950 km.

If you want to go by car, the driving distance between East London and Gaborone is 1151.77 km. If you ride your car with an average speed of 112 kilometers/hour (70 miles/h), travel time will be 10 hours 17 minutes. Please check the avg. speed travel time table on the right for various options.

Difference between fly and go by a car is 202 km.
